thread.title: Defendant in 2012 murder case mistakenly released from prison
thread.title_full: Defendant in 2012 murder case mistakenly released from prison

author: Liam Ford
title: Defendant in 2012 murder case mistakenly released from prison
text:
Defendant in 2012 murder case mistakenly released from prison Garrett Glover Illinois Department of Corrections photos 
Cook County sheriff's officials were notified Monday, Feb. 27, 2017, that Garrett Glover, 29, had been released from Illinois Department of Corrections custody after being sentenced to four years in prison Thursday, Feb. 23, 2017, in a 2014 attempted armed robbery case from County Club Hills. Glover is awaiting trial in the Sept. 5, 2012, shooting of Larry Porter, 25, near 87th Street on the Dan Ryan.
